name: NSC Math 120
body:
### Welcome to NSC Math 120
This is out central hub where we host content for the Nevada State College Math 120 course,

### The Big Vision
Our course will be broken up into 3 components.

1. Financial Mathematics
2. Probability and Statistics
3. Algebra and Data

For each of these components we will create pre-lecture assignments and in-class work.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
